subject: Order SSN1772 tracking
description_text:
Hi Simsonn,

I received a dispatch notification on the 18th of June but the tracking
page have no information on the package.



Can you please provide an update?

Regards,
Kelly

conversations.body_text: Hi Kelly W,     Here is the latest tracking information. We sincerely apologize for the delay in your order, which was caused by a shortage of components from our supplier.Â
